answerText: central forces[10] An important set of laws governing central forces are the three laws of planetary motion named for this physicist. The second one says that an orbiting body sweeps out equal areas in equal time.

subject: Science
question: Question: These forces always point towards an origin, and their magnitude depends only on the distance between the point and the origin. For 10 points each: [10] Name this type of force, inverse-square versions of which include gravitational and electrostatic forces.
